amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Forest Service by $13 million and decrease funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $31.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding by $13 million for the Forest and Rangeland Research and decrease funding by $31.588 million for Grants and Adminstration under the National Endowment for the Arts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 270 (Roll no. 554).
